note.p: Education: Charterhouse; Edinburgh; apprenticed to John Green Crosse, surgeon of Norwich (FRS 1836) MD (1852)

Career: Curator, Anatomical Museum, University of Edinburgh; Prosector to John Goodsir (FRS 1846); moved to London and studied helminthology; Lecturer in Comparative Anatomy and Zoology, Middlesex Medical College (1860-1873); Swiney Professor of Geology (1868-1878); Professor of Helminthology, Royal Veterinary College; wrote papers on Entozoa
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1889-1890 vol 47 pp iv-v signed by J B S
